showScoreExcerpt: "'Hamilton' joins the ranks of great American musicals...Considered as an American musical dealing directly with Americana an argument could eventually be made for 'Hamilton' as the nation's greatest musical...If a musical even close in quality to this one emerges this season, we're lucky.
